Our Motto Is
Promoting your financial data security

Financial information is critical for every organization. It’s essential to keep these confidential data safe and secure from any malware or cyber-attacks. Our firm makes sure that all the information shared with us is safe. We consider this as our topmost priority.

With our strong data security, your business’s backbone, confidential financial information, are safe. This information passes through little hands, who’re responsible and trustworthy.

Financial Data Security With Us

We offer a robust solution that enables organizations to immediately look into financial data security without involving any further investments.

  • Protection towards email-borne security breach.
  • No data leakage
  • Exchange of large files securely through emails
  • Email archiving
  • Email continuity
Get Started now

How do we achieve these?

  • Access of data to restricted users
  • Getting into NDA with our clients and employees
  • Multiple layer authentication system
  • Complete online transaction
  • Having ‘read-only’ rights to the client’s data
  • Disabled USB & Data Transfer Devices
  • 24*7 CCTV Surveillance
  • Key Card Access-based Restrictions
  • No Pens-Paper-Printers in the operations area
  • Controlled/Limited Internet Access
  • No Social Media & e-Commerce Websites
  • Blocked Access to Personal Emails
  • Strong Firewall & 256-bit SSL Encryption
  • Process-defined Access to File Type Download & Access
  • Server access on a need-to-know basis
  • Monitored Instant Messaging & Email Exchange
Let’s Start
